statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_history;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT description FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_id = 10;
SELECT transaction_id, description FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE description LIKE '%payment%' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM transaction_date) AS month FROM transaction_history GROUP BY EXTRACT(MONTH FROM transaction_date) ORDER BY month;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT transaction_type, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM transaction_history GROUP BY transaction_type;
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT report_id, report_type, report_data FROM reports WHERE report_type = 'financial';
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, user_id FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY transaction_type
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' AND user_id = 200 ORDER BY transaction_date LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' AND report_type = 'sales' ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT * FROM transaction_history;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM transaction_history WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM user_info ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_info WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM user_info WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT username, email FROM user_info WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_info ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE status = 'approved' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT report_id, report_name, report_date FROM report_analysis WHERE analysis_results LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM TransactionHistory;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) FROM TransactionHistory GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT username, email FROM UserAccounts WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_name, report_date, LENGTH(report_content) AS content_length FROM ReportData ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT detail_id, product_id, quantity, amount_per_unit FROM TransactionDetails WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY amount_per_unit ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserAccounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM UserAccounts WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM TransactionHistory WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT th.transaction_id, td.product_id, td.quantity FROM TransactionHistory th INNER JOIN TransactionDetails td ON th.transaction_id = td.transaction_id WHERE th.amount > 100;
SELECT report_id, report_name, DATE_FORMAT(report_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM ReportData WHERE report_content LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT report_date, description FROM reports WHERE generated_by_user = 'Admin';
SELECT detail_id, report_id, product_id, quantity FROM report_details ORDER BY detail_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE generated_by_user = 'Admin' AND report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01'

SELECT r.report_date, rd.quantity, p.product_name FROM reports r JOIN report_details rd ON r.report_id = rd.report_id JOIN products p ON rd.product_id = p.product_id WHERE r.report_date >= '2021-06-01'
